title: Building websites in Santos | Zakta Technology
home-p1: We are specialist in websites development, virtual stores, applications, blogs, systems, among other software.
home-p2: We have the required experience to understand your business, offer ideas and built a project totally custom-made for your company.
text-services-1: Modern websites, responsive, with personalized design and totally professional.
text-services-2: Creation of virtual stores suitable to your business.
text-services-3: Systems accessed by web totally personalized.
text-services-4: Your website highlighted on Google through SEO.
text-services-5: Application development for Android and iPhone.
text-services-7: Single page with strong commercial appeal and efficient for collection of leads.
text-services-8: Professionals specialized to development and system analysis
text-services-9: Analysis of key words and campaigns Google AdWords
text-services-10: Modern blogs, professional and totally custom-made.
about-info: Zakta exists to create solutions that facilitate actions and generate results to peaple and companies with specialized technology.
about-company-p1: A information technology company specialized on analysis, development, consultancy and implementation of applications web and mobile.
about-company-p2: We act since the initial phase of the business plan conception to the project publication. We have a team specialized capable of creating diverse applications in different programming languages and technologies.
about-company-p3: Our goal is to transform our experience and professional baggage in means to achieve the outcome expected by our clients through our digital solutions.
about-list-p2: Expertise in multiple tools and software
company-title-1: We understand the needs of your business
company-text-2: We analyze the requisites, assemble an adequate strategy and present the proposals.
company-text-3: During the production phase, we perform constant meetings with the team and client to follow through the progress and approve the main deliveries.
company-text-4: After the final validation of the project, we perform the publication, measuring the access, follow through the results and immediate support.
contact-subtitle: Any doubt? Reach out to us and we will reply soon.
form-description: Please fill out this form. Your data will remain private and will only be used to better understand your needs. We will answer you within one business day.
modal-cookie: We use cookies and similar methods to recognize visitors and remember their preferences, measure the effectiveness of the advertising campaign, target ads and analyze website traffic. Find out more by visiting our
text-service-info-form: Interested? Contact us and request a budget.
